thawada, idiriyedi aapada kalamanakarana madhyasthana ha siwil sanwidhana samanga sambandhikaranaya wi mewani puhunu wadasatahan pawathwimata nawika hamudawa katayuthu karana athara, mema awasthawa sandaha wanathawilluwa, pradeshiya lekam, si jayasinha mahatha, shri lankawe aasiya pasifik sanwidhana aapada kalamanakarana madhyasthanaye adhyaksha irsan hashim mahatha, aapada kalamanakarana madhyasthanaye niyojya adhyaksha (hadisi meheyum) jeeeemaar jayarathna mahatha, puththalama disthrik aapada kalamanakarana sambandhikarana niladhari, luthinan karnal pieeje rodrigu mahatha, shri lankawe amerika eksath janapada thanapathi karyalaye niyojitha saha kapithan jef bentan mahatha athulu pradeshaye rajya niladharin wishala pirisak da sahabhagi wi sitiyaha.

eeta hethuwa ihala stharaye sita pahala sthara dakwa wesena pakshina shri lankawe wi waga karana pasa theth kalapiya dumbauru pasa gle pasa ha diyalu pasa da, theth ha atharamadi kalapawala rathu kaha podsolik pasa ha rathu dumbauru latasolik pasa da, theth kalapaye aparinatha dumbauru loma pasa ha ardha waguru ha waguru pasa da, wiyali kalapaye wiksharitha solanet pasa, solonowak pasa ha grubosol pasa yana kandawalata ayath pa shri lankawe theth kalapaye samanalunwikipidiya, nidahas wishwakoshaya wethinwetha paninna:sanchalanaya,soyannalokaye samanala warga 24000k pamana sitina waga thahawaru wi thibe.ee athurin merata kula 11kataayath samanala warga 245k pamana wasaya karayi.minwarga 23k pamana shri lankawata aawenikawe.[thahawuru kara puwath theth kalapaye puran wu kumbauru akkara 3000 k yal kannaye waga kere theth kalapaye wi wagawa ihala nanwime theth kalapaye puran wu kumbauru akkara 3000 k yal kannaye waga kere akitha perera theth kalapaye wi wagawa ihala nanwime aramunin ema kalapaye puranwa athi kumbauru akkara 3000 k yala kannaye di waga kirimata gowijana sewa sanwardhana departhamenthuwa salasum kara atha.

eya meseyi:“ese wuwa da, ladaruwan saha kuda lamayin sandaha wana aaharayak ho ee aaharayak matha 1 wani upa lekhanaye 1 wani, 2 wani saha 3 wani ayithamawala nishchithawa sandahan karana lada yam prathioksikarakayak ho eewaye sanyogayak adangu nowiya yuthuya.”gasat niwedanaya magin anumathiya laba di athi prathioksikaraka wuwada ladaruwan saha kuda lamayin sandaha wana aahara sandaha bhawitha nokala yuthuya yanna ehi arthayayi.prathioksikaraka yanu monawa dayi nodanna patakayange danaganima pinisa ee pilibanda handinwimak karamu.gasat niwedanaye anka 9 yatathe sandahan paridi “‘prathioksikaraka’ yanu aaharawala mudu rasak ho oksikaranaya magin rasayehi parihaniyak athi kirima pramada karana, adu karana ho walakwana drawyayak adahas wana athara eeta lesinin, askobik amlaya ho ehi lawana,tokoforal warga, sitrik amlaya ho posparik amlaya athulath nowe.”esema gasat niwedanayata anuwa,“ladaruwan yannen masa dolahata adu lamayin adahas we.

(mahinda rajapakshage awasthawa wyawasthanukulawa nathi kota athi bawa sihi kala manawa.) 1990ta pasu upan miliyana dekakata kittu tharuna pirisak mema janapathiwaranayedi thama chundaya bhawitha karana heyin ha owunge pa්rathishathaya mulu chunda sankhyawen 17% tharam ihala heyin namal rajapaksha idiripath kirima wuwa salaka baliya haki eksperiment ekaki.
